references.paper_title: Training diffusion models with reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper is foundational for RL-based diffusion model fine-tuning, a key method compared against in the current research.
This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), the core technology that underpins the current work.
This paper offers a different mathematical framework for diffusion models, which provides a broader theoretical context for the current research.

references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper provides an alternative theoretical basis for diffusion models, focusing on stochastic differential equations, which complements the DDPM approach.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces a high-resolution image generation method based on diffusion models, improving the quality of generated images which is a key aspect of the current work.
